title: Serif—newspaper
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this typeface is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/azertyu_5459.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/azertyui_4379.JPG)
author: Emma-L

comments.content: This is [Photina](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204918/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/photina_pro_volume/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=50&sample_text=ergste%20doen%20beseffen&ft=liga) by José Mendoza. The Pro version even has an ff-ligature that is painfully missing from your sample ;-)
